title: NotPetya, Part 1
description: On June 28th, 2017, millions of Ukranians were celebrating 'Constitution Day.' Their national holiday turned into a nightmare, as tens of thousands of  computers all over the country were infected by a mysterious malware. By that afternoon, the cyber-pandemic was already going global.
content:encoded: On June 28th, 2017, millions of Ukranians were celebrating ‘Constitution Day.’ Their national holiday turned into a nightmare, as tens of thousands of computers all over the country were infected by a mysterious malware. By that afternoon, the cyber-pandemic was already going global.
